document_data.name: Ko Mihn Gi
document_data.mainbody: '''Ko Mihn Gi''' was a [[Shou]] mayor in [[Akari]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Ko Mihn Gi was a member of the mercantile [[Ko clan]], the younger brother of [[Ko Lei Kho]]. He was mayor of the town of [[Shu Lan]].
document_data.Personality: Mihn Gi thought that Lei Kho was confronting the [[ochimo]] treat too mildly but family loyalty prevented him from protesting.
